I think I heard mention that someone has been designing scenarios, do these make use of the current cards or are they creating their own cards?

If they make use of the current cards I think thye would be really cool to try them out, however I don't know how to get to them (call it laziness or busy...maybe both). and was wondering if someone could point me to a website or forum post that includes them or information on them.

 

Thanks.
